text: Ix xixqebꞌ rukꞌ ri Jesús, naꞌtaj chiꞌwe chi xa rumal ri Areꞌ ri Dios xubꞌan jun kꞌakꞌ chꞌekom tzij iwukꞌ ix. Tyox che ri ukikꞌel ri Jesús ri xtixtobꞌik are xkamik xeꞌkuyutaj ri qamak. Rumal kꞌu riꞌ, ri Jesús are nim uqꞌij cho ri Abel, rumal cher ri ukikꞌel ri Abel man kakuyun taj xane are karaj kabꞌan qꞌatoj tzij.
